API_URL.description: A URL pointing to the Canvas Pro API

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID for a GitHub OAuth application

GITHUB_REDIRECT_URL.description: Redirect URL for a GitHub OAuth callback

NODE_ENV.description: Environment to run Node process in

NPM_TOKEN.description: An NPM token for fetching private modules

PORT.description: Port on which to run the app

REALTIME_HOST.description: A host pointing to the realtime service

SENTRY_DSN.description: Key for posting errors and events to Sentry

SLACK_CLIENT_ID.description: A client ID for a Slack application
